segments.text: I see the water just pouring out of the sink, and the woman doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s spreading all over the floor, and she’s just standing there drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how unaware she is of the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she’s completely missing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever going to turn around and notice what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is getting everywhere, and she’s still just focused on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn’t slip and fall in all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is going to be ruined if she doesn’t do something soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she is while everything around her is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of the most bizarre things I’ve ever seen.
segments.speaker: PAR
